component.name: NeoStation
component.summary: Modern frontend for retro gaming with cloud sync

p.b: This is a proprietary application by Neo Game Lab, Inc.

description.p: NeoStation is a modern, user-centric frontend for retro gaming that prioritizes exceptional UX/UI design and seamless cross-platform compatibility.

ul.li: Deep RetroArch integration for multiple retro systems
Nintendo Switch emulator support (Eden, Citron, Ryujinx)
NeoSync: Cloud-based save synchronization across all devices
Intuitive interface with gamepad and touch support
